news.title: Stock market today: Dow slips as S&P 500, Nasdaq rise in march to latest records
news.description: Wall Street is staying bullish as the economy shows signs of strength.
news.content:
US stocks were mixed on Friday, hovering near record highs as signs of strength in the economy provided the buoyancy that Netflix's (NFLX) earnings report lacked.
